name: Wonder Project J: Machine Boy Pino
name_original: Wonder Project J: Machine Boy Pino
description: Wonder Project J: Kikai no Shōnen Pīno (ワンダープロジェクトJ機械の少年ピーノ, Wonder Project J: Machine Boy Pino) is a Japan-exclusive video game published by Enix for the Super Famicom in 1994. The game is a raising simulation in which the player raises a Pinocchio-esque boy, using a point and click interface like an adventure game.[
